title: BollywoodKart Brings the Silver Screen Fashion to Your Doorstep
text:
Friday, September 18, 2015 5:16PM IST (11:46AM GMT) BollywoodKart Brings the Silver Screen Fashion to Your Doorstep New Delhi, Delhi, India 
Have you ever been crazy of any dress you seen in a movie or want to wear “Karina wala Designer Lehenga”, then Bollywoodkart is your spot to buy your designer lehenga or Bollywood replica sarees. This e-commerce site brings Bollywood glamour and sheen to every wardrobe by selling traditional attire sported by the Bollywood female celebrity. Everybody loves to be admired and when it comes to look, the Bollywood stars are the fashion role model for all. The sarees, suits, lehengas and other traditional attire projected in film industry are the best and influences fashion by becoming the trade mark. Bollywoodkart provides all with the unique opportunity to purchase replica of these attires worn by the star in one or the other occasion, that too at an affordable price. The prices are extraordinarily low due to the reason that the products are bought directly from the manufacturing and thus saving the unnecessary expense on the middlemen. Moreover instead of charging the usual commission of 25 percent the site charges only 15 percent to facilitate the lowest possible price for the customer that also includes shipping charges. Sellers will be delighted to know that there are no shipping charges, whereas all other marketplace are charging for Shipping at this moment. So be it the saree worn by Katrina or be it the Lehenga’s worn by Deepika PaduKone or be it any other celebrity, one could buy the exact copy on this website, which will be delivered at their door steps. Further there are other traditional attires too, made using superior fabric ensuring supreme quality, mind blowing designs and unique styling. The founder, Mr. Viany Arora said, “Bollywood stars denote fashion and fashion rises from them, so it is natural for women to desire to look like them. This has inspired us to introduce this unique endeavor and present all with the Bollywood attire replicas at the best prices”. He further mentions, “Glamour is desired by all the ladies. Bollywoodkart not only assist them to become glamorous but also make a style statement.” Specifying the future plans he implies that more and more sellers are registering on Bollywoodkart to enhance their ethnic wear product reach and projections are to get 5000+ sellers onboard before Diwali season. Adding more Mr. Vinay Said,” We will be adding women accessories like handbags, artificial jewelry, artifacts, souvenirs and many other contemporary women accessories soon”. He also added, “To ensure overall consumer satisfaction we are providing cash on delivery feature as well”. The website is all ready to make its presence felt in the online market scene in India. Bollywoodkart is the best destination for traditional attire and replica of the Bollywood star clothing range at the most affordable price and lots of choices. Shop from this online portal as it is the best place to find your desired look and if wanna be the talk of the town!
